title: The default value set in a list box report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
description:
Description: The default value set in a list box report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify the value 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. [Missing description for the final step]
OB: The default value set in the list box report parameter is not retained after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value set in the list box report parameter should be retained even after modifying the default value.
SR: New a report parameter, set the Display type to List Box. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa', and click OK. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
